snippet: For years, employees at Goldman Sachs automatically received a brokerage account. But in recent months, the firm has notified several employees, most of whom have assets valued at less than $1 million, that their accounts are being transferred to...
abstract: For years, employees at Goldman Sachs automatically received a brokerage account. But in recent months, the firm has notified several employees, most of whom have assets valued at less than $1 million, that their accounts are being transferred to Fidelity.

headline.main: At Goldman, a Paycheck No Longer Equals an Account
